com.google.protobuf

Class TestUtil.ReflectionTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.protobuf.TestUtil.ReflectionTester
  • Enclosing class:
    TestUtil

    public static class TestUtil.ReflectionTester
extends Object
    Performs the same things that the methods of TestUtil do, but via the reflection interface. This is its own class because it needs to know what descriptor to use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestUtil.ReflectionTester(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.Descriptor baseDescriptor, com.google.protobuf.ExtensionRegistry extensionRegistry)
      Construct a ReflectionTester that will expect messages using the given descriptor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestUtil.ReflectionTester

        public TestUtil.ReflectionTester(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.Descriptor baseDescriptor,
                         com.google.protobuf.ExtensionRegistry extensionRegistry)
        Construct a ReflectionTester that will expect messages using the given descriptor. Normally baseDescriptor should be a descriptor for the type TestAllTypes, defined in google/protobuf/unittest.proto. However, if extensionRegistry is non-null, then baseDescriptor should be for TestAllExtensions instead, and instead of reading and writing normal fields, the tester will read and write extensions. All of TestAllExtensions' extensions must be registered in the registry.

    • Method Detail

        Set every field of message to the values expected by assertAllFieldsSet(), using the Message.Builder reflection interface.

      • modifyRepeatedFieldsViaReflection

      • assertReflectionSettersRejectNull

        public void assertReflectionSettersRejectNull(com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder builder)
                                       throws Exception
        Verifies that the reflection setters for the given.Builder object throw a NullPointerException if they are passed a null value. Uses Assert to throw an appropriate assertion failure, if the condition is not verified.
        Throws:
        Exception

                                               throws Exception
        Verifies that the reflection repeated setters for the given Builder object throw a NullPointerException if they are passed a null value. Uses Assert to throw an appropriate assertion failure, if the condition is not verified.
        Throws:
